author: CBS News
title: Global divisions deepen amid Israel-Hamas war
description: While President Biden has affirmed U.S. support for Israel, Russia and China have called for a cease-fire. Steve Inskeep, host of NPR's "Morning Edition," joins CBS News to discuss what we can learn from Abraham Lincoln's presidency about today's divisions.
